channel.title: Learning the basics on TMC - Gemma
channel.description: Recent content in Learning the basics on TMC - Gemma

item.title: CircuitPython
item.description: Let’s get something happening on your Gemma. All of these examples are complete programs, so make sure you copy them into Mu (or whatever editor you’re using) and run them as you go through this page. Flash the built-in LED Flash the built-in RGB LED Respond to the capacitive input Capacitive input and the RGB LED Flash the built-in LED The first thing you try to get working on any embedded system is flashing a light.
